physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 7 x 9 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Printed on front of photograph: ''June Class. 1917. Cheltenham School. Denver, Colo. A. Martin, Photo.'' Handwritten on back of matting: ''Cheltenham, 3rd from left Lena Radetsky Barron, #1094.''

mods.abstract: Teachers pose with their students, the class of 1917 on the steps of Cheltenham School located at West Colfax Avenue and Irving Street in Denver, Colorado. The boys wear suits with short pants and the girls wear dresses. Lena Radetsky Barron sits third from left in the front row.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
